title: Beach Cleanup Drive at Juhu
summary: Join us for a morning beach cleanup at Juhu Beach. Help remove plastic waste and debris to protect marine life.
description: Every weekend, tons of plastic waste washes up on Mumbai's beaches. Join our volunteer team for a 3-hour cleanup drive at Juhu Beach.
address: Juhu Beach, near Prithvi Theatre, Juhu, Mumbai 400049
requirements: Wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can get wet.

title: Teaching English to Underprivileged Children
summary: Volunteer as an English teacher for children in Dharavi. Make a lasting impact through education.
description: Help children from low-income families learn English communication skills.
address: Hope Learning Center, 60 Feet Road, Dharavi, Mumbai 400017
requirements: Fluent English speaker. Background check required.

title: Blood Donation Camp
summary: Donate blood and save lives. One donation can save up to 3 lives!
description: In partnership with the Red Cross, we're organizing a blood donation camp.
address: WeWork Galaxy, Residency Road, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore 560025
requirements: Age 18-65, weight above 50kg. Carry a valid ID.

title: Animal Shelter Volunteering
summary: Spend time with rescued animals at our shelter. Help with feeding, grooming, and socialization.
description: PAWS Animal Shelter rescues stray and abandoned animals in Pune.
address: PAWS Shelter, Survey No. 45, Near Bhugaon Lake, Pune 411042
requirements: Comfortable around animals. Tetanus vaccination recommended.

title: Tree Plantation Drive
summary: Plant trees and help combat air pollution in Delhi NCR.
description: Delhi's air quality crisis needs urgent action. Join our tree plantation drive.
address: Biodiversity Park, Near Vasant Kunj, New Delhi 110070
requirements: Wear full-sleeved clothes and closed shoes.

title: Free Health Checkup Camp
summary: Volunteer doctors and nurses needed for a free health camp in rural Chennai.
description: We're organizing a free health checkup camp for villagers.
address: Government School, Thiruporur Village, Chengalpattu District
requirements: Medical professionals must bring valid license.

title: Online Mentorship for College Students
description: Our virtual mentorship program connects experienced professionals with students.

title: Food Distribution Drive for Homeless
summary: Help distribute meals to homeless individuals in Hyderabad.
description: Every Sunday evening, we distribute freshly cooked meals to homeless individuals.
address: Community Kitchen, Banjara Hills Road No. 12, Hyderabad 500034
requirements: Enthusiasm to serve is all you need!

title: Coastal Cleanup Goa
summary: Clean Goa's beaches and learn about marine conservation.
description: Join us for a full-day coastal cleanup event followed by a workshop.

title: Stray Dog Vaccination Drive
summary: Help catch and vaccinate stray dogs in Jaipur.
address: Animal Aid Unlimited, Badi, Udaipur Road

title: Rural School Library Setup
summary: Help set up a library in a rural school.
description: We've collected over 2000 books for a government school in rural Karnataka.
address: Government Higher Primary School, Srirangapatna, Mysore District

title: Senior Citizen Companionship
summary: Spend quality time with elderly residents at old age homes.
description: Many elderly residents in old age homes feel lonely and isolated.
address: Multiple partner old age homes across Kolkata

title: Plastic-Free Campus Workshop
summary: Conduct workshops on reducing plastic waste in colleges.
description: Be a part of our movement to make Gujarat's colleges plastic-free!

title: Wildlife Census Volunteer
summary: Assist forest officials in annual wildlife census at Jim Corbett.
description: Join the annual wildlife census at Jim Corbett National Park!
address: Jim Corbett National Park, Ramnagar, Uttarakhand 244715

title: Digital Literacy for Rural Women
summary: Teach basic smartphone and internet skills to rural women online.
description: Many rural women have access to smartphones but lack the skills to use them.
requirements: Fluency in Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, or Telugu.

title: Teach Coding to School Students
summary: Volunteer as an online coding instructor for underprivileged students.
description: Help bridge the digital divide by teaching basic programming.
requirements: Basic programming knowledge. Laptop with stable internet.

title: Community Garden Development
summary: Help develop an urban community garden in Kochi.
description: Transform a vacant lot in Fort Kochi into a thriving community garden!
address: Near St. Francis Church, Fort Kochi, Kochi 682001
requirements: Gardening experience helpful but not required.

title: Pet Adoption Fair Support
summary: Help organize and run a pet adoption fair in Mumbai.
description: Our quarterly pet adoption fair is the biggest in Mumbai.

title: River Rejuvenation Project
summary: Join the movement to clean and rejuvenate local rivers in Varanasi.
description: The Ganga and its tributaries need our help.
requirements: Early morning availability on second Sunday of each month.
